message: Let's start fair. You get 10%, I get 90%.  We can negotiate later if you're not happy.
I'm willing to give you a better deal. You get 30%, I get 70%. It's still a good compromise.
Let's meet in the middle. I'll take 40%, you take 60%.  This is a fair deal given the current inflation rate.
I'm willing to compromise further. You get 45%, I get 55%. It's getting closer to a fair deal.
